select t.id, t.user_name, t.nick_name, t.email, t.real_name, t.id_card_type, t.id_card_no, t.gender, t.nation, t.birthday, t.qq, t.wechat, t.mobile_phone, t.user_status, t.summary, t.register_channel, t.register_time, t.register_ip, t.creator, t.create_time, t.editor, t.update_time from t_user t
and t.user_name like concat('%',#{user.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.nick_name like concat('%',#{user.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.email like concat('%',#{user.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.user_status = #{user.userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and exists (select 1 from t_user_role ur where t.id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
and exists (select 1 from t_user_dept ud where t.id = ud.user_id and ud.dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

select t.id, t.user_name, t.nick_name, t.email, t.real_name, t.id_card_type, t.id_card_no, t.gender, t.nation, t.birthday, t.qq, t.wechat, t.mobile_phone, t.user_status, t.summary, t.register_channel, t.register_time, t.register_ip, t.creator, t.create_time, t.editor, t.update_time from t_user t
and not exists (select 1 from t_user_role ur where t.id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
and exists (select 1 from t_user_role ur where t.id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
and not exists (select 1 from t_user_dept ud where t.id = ud.user_id and ud.dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
and exists (select 1 from t_user_dept ud where t.id = ud.user_id and ud.dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
and t.user_name like concat('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit 200

select distinct role.role_id as id, role.role_code, p.privilege_code, p.privilege_name, p.resource_path, p.resource_type from (select t.id, ar.role_id, r.role_code from t_user t join t_user_role ar on t.id = ar.user_id join t_role r on ar.role_id = r.id where t.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ar.role_id is not null union select t.id, dr.role_id, r.role_code from t_user t join t_user_dept ad on t.id = ad.user_id join t_dept_role dr on ad.dept_id = dr.dept_id join t_role r on dr.role_id = r.id where t.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dr.role_id is not null) role left join(select rp.role_id, rp.privilege_id, p.privilege_code, p.privilege_name, p.resource_path, p.resource_type from t_role_privilege rp join t_privilege p on rp.privilege_id = p.id) p on p.role_id = role.role_id
